700487f-a.title: Bronx: Beach Avenue - Gleason Avenue
700487f-a.text:
Beach Ave., north from Gleason Ave. In the background is visible
the rear of Public School No. 47, at the S.W. corner of East 172nd
Street.
About 1915.
James Suydam.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
700487f-a.folder: Beach Avenue & Gleason Avenue, Bronx, NY
